nodes.text: The Ragnar system was located in the Merel sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the remote astronomical object Ragnar VIII. The home offices of the Ragnar Syndicate, a chapter house of the Bounty Hunters' Guild, were located on Ragnar VIII, leading to the celestial body being considered the homeworld of the house.

The Ragnar system was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a 1993 sourcebook written by Simon Smith and Eric S. Trautmann for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it in grid square Q-18.
